attributes.action: Stop travel companies increasing their prices during school holidays.
attributes.additional_details: A petition has been set up to request up to 2 weeks leave for children during term time which has been responded to by the government.
attributes.background: Parents are getting penalised for taking their children out of school during term time yet travel companies are still able to charge extortionate prices to families who are willing/ and who are made to take their children on holiday during school holidays. It's not fair! It all comes down to money!
